extendedInfo.description: Hi! :-)This live wallpaper born from fantastic idea of my first app "Magic touch: Attacking shark" view https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.custom.lwp.MagictouchAttackingsharkoneIt's very interactive. With finger touch you create a water's ripple effect...you see the result effect!In setting menu is possible to set three different backgrounds.This live wallpaper that takes up very little space on your phone and also can be moved on SD memory.Enjoy!!!Instruction for use:Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live WallpapersCreating an app takes time and money, In order to keep creating great (and free!) apps, we are using a new search service to monetize our apps. With this service we are able to create more great apps for you guys. This option bundles a few search points (push notification or other) for you to use. You can erase these easily and with no effect to our app. Thanks!

reviews.title: Dating adds!  Come on now
reviews.comment: This is good wallpaper but I don\'t appreciate the dating add emails I\'m getting. Get rid of them! I\'m uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User
